General.Name: Making Science Group S.A.
General.Description: Making Science Group, S.A., together with its subsidiaries, provides advertising and public relations services in the areas of data, analytics, and adtech, digital advertising, software and cloud, salesforce, and eCommerce and marketplaces worldwide. The company offers Ad-machina, a technology that allows companies advertise their products and services through Google Ads; Nilo, a cloud-based e-commerce platform; Gauss, a platform that offers a suite of solutions that creates a data-driven ecosystem; and Shoptize, a price comparator that allows end users to compare prices of various products. It also provides custom software development, digital product design, data and analytics, advertising, brand and content strategy, programmatic and paid search, search engine optimization, conversion rate optimization, CRM and marketing automation, network resources, data storage, software administration services, and technical support services. The company offers its products and solutions under the pilot ignite, TREKRONORMEDIA, making science, agua3, and LOYAL brand names. The company is based in Madrid, Spain. Making Science Group, S.A. is a subsidiary of The Science of Digital S.L.
